author: Quinten van der Werf
comment: Easy and simple to use.  Can't change any settings,  so can't specify who starts serving,  when tie break happens,  or even how many sets to play. It's a good start but would appreciate some ability to change settings. When using the app it's also a bit too easy to give someone a point and a bit too hard to undo the point (by swiping up).
title: A good start but missing features
